Based on true story

My Three Girl'Friends

-There’s one path left to go. One Love

I am ABEER
Writer, artist.

My aim is to touch souls through my words. I put love into words to help you connect with the people, plus the memories

  • I love being a writer and it’s the most fulfilling job I’ve ever had
  • As a male, brought up to treat women right.
  • Women are amazing!
  • My mother, Who is my source of strength, showed me by being an example that women are beautiful

My Three Girl'Friends

Women are blessing to the world, there is no world without a women..!

ABEER AND RIDDHI MET EACH OTHER IN THAT OLD DUSTY CLASSROOM. IT WAS HEAVILY POURING OUTSIDE. HER FRAGRANCE WAS KILLING HIM. HE WAS BREATHLESS. HIS ONLY EMOTION WAS “RIDDHI”. HER GRACE GRIPPED HIM FROM HEAD TO TOE. THOSE SPARKLING BROWN EYES HELD HIM MESMERIZED. HER DAZZLING SMILE MADE HIS WORLD BEAUTIFUL. CUPID SUCCEEDED IN TYING STRONG STRINGS BETWEEN THEM. IT BECAME A TALE OF A GIRL WHO CHANGED A BRUTE TO A MAN. SHE MADE HIM COMPLETE.

THERE WORLD WAS AMAZING, UNTIL ONE MORNING EVERYTHING CHANGED. RIDDHI DECIDED TO CUT ALL THE CONNECTION FROM ABEER. SHE GAVE A CALL TO BREAK THEIR RELATIONSHIP. ABEER WAS TORMENTED

WILL RIDDHI AND ABEER SURVIVE THIS JOURNEY TOGETHER? DEEP INSIDE HE KNEW THAT HE SHOULD STOP HOPING. BUT WHY? HE NEVER KNEW. THE HUES OF LOVE IN THE AIR ARE MAGICAL. IN THIS SWEET SERENITY OF LIFE, WILL THE CALL OF DESTINY CHANGE TRAILS OF LOVE?

ANTICIPATING, RARE AND AN EMOTIONAL JOURNEY AHEAD.
